name: Tech Forums
description: Discussions and news from tech communities.
selectionPrompt: Pick only substantial threads: OP links to real tech (code, release, CVE) or shares deep experience. Prefer threads with many substantive comments (top comments >150 chars). Skip questions/rants.
essencePrompt: Discussion synthesis (80–120 words): context, strongest pro argument (quote), strongest counterpoint (quote), one concrete datapoint or resource, and a practical takeaway.
perspectivesPrompt: Three one‑sentence perspectives using comments when possible: 1) Top comment — key point, 2) Practitioner — concrete tip/gotcha, 3) Skeptic — specific critique. If none: 'No meaningful perspectives found.'
